title: league keeps crashing right when i enter champ select
body: league keeps crashing right when i enter champ select causing me to lose lp and long dodge times. does not happen every time

replies.body: I've seen reports of this issue where some players are crashing during champion select or while opening up Hextech crafting.  It turns out that there is an issue where third party programs that interact with League are causing  this to happen.  If you have apps like play.tv running, remove them and try again.  That should get you fixed up!
I just posted a thread about this as well. Its rediculous that we get penalized for something that isnt our fault.
